This experience was superb in every way!  Made reservations almost 2 months ago online, required to leave a 50 euro / person deposit.  Had a 7:30PM reservation, which is extremely early for Barcelona.  As soon as we walked in, staff was extremely welcoming and presented an aperol based cocktail to start.  They offered a wine pairing for dinner, but we opted for a bottle of wine (som was very helpful).  Each course was set out in various countries from Spain, Japan, Peru, Korea, Denmark, Russia and more.  Very thoughtful service and presentation.  Food was incredible (see pics of almost every course posted!  my husband thought it was a bit annoying).  Pricey but worth every penny... Took four hours to complete the entire meal.
